price: 70. O jūs tikintieji, vykdykite savo pareigą Allahui ir baiminkitės Jo, ir kalbėkite (visada) tiesą.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَقُولُواْ قَوۡلٗا سَدِيدٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha waqūlū qawlan sadīdan
